column4: does anyone know how to mount a pfs.img file?  this is part of my router firmware, file does not give any useful information, so I'm not holding any high hopes
there are some tools that can convert .img to .iso
are they not just for iso9660 format?
I don't understand exactly what knockd pages are telling me
knockd will tell your server to open ports if you know the secret knocks
just like your magic WOL packet would do
I want my server to Wake-on-LAN
are they? I thought they were just link-layer packets and therefore local
as I understand it they are broadcast packets
you were right and I was not completely wrong
I need to either get OpenWRT/DD-WRT/whatever onto my router, or get a new router with it on to do what I want
I have a spare cisco monster for you ;)
I'm currently in "discussion" with Belkin (soon to also be Philips and SMC who make compatible firmware) to release GPL code
